metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3861 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: LibUtils in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.x before 5.0.2, 5.1.x before5.1.1, 6.x before 2016-09-01, and 7.0 before 2016-09-01 mishandlesconversions between Unicode character encodings with different encodingwidths, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause adenial of service (heap-based buffer overflow) via a crafted file, akainternal bug 29250543.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
